title: VPN Connectivity Troubleshooting
description: Resolving VPN connection, authentication, and speed issues.

steps.title: Internet & Time Check
steps.instruction: Verify your internet connection and ensure your system date/time settings are correct.

steps.title: App & System Reset
steps.instruction: Restart the VPN application and your system.

steps.title: Credential & Server Check
steps.instruction: Verify the VPN server address and re-enter your credentials carefully.

steps.title: Alternative Connection
steps.instruction: Try connecting via a mobile hotspot to rule out home/office ISP issues.

steps.title: Ticket Preparation
steps.instruction: If still failing, raise a ticket with: Asset ID, VPN Name, Error Screenshot, Location (Home/Office), and steps tried.
